Components

See how you can use Northbricks Components in your business. Theses are wasy to use sollutions when you donâ€™t want to use Northbricks API.

Payment component

The payment component is used when you want to provide a payment alternative where your customer pays from their bank account.

You need to ask for Payment Provider ID from Northbricks. Send an email to info@northbricks.com for more information.

Payment component usage

Add a link to https://api.northbricks.io/payment-web?pid=your-payment-provider-id. This link will let your customer make the payment.
